page.title: 15A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My name is Deborah Hamblin. I am 9 years old. I will tell you what I do on Monday.I wake up at 7.30. I lay in till 8.00 and then get dressed, go down stairs and have my breakfast.Then it is soon time to go to school. When I get to school I talk to my friends Vicki,Katie and Verity until bell-time at 9.00.When we go in we have register and then maths until playtime. After play we do topic work for an hour. At 12.00 we have our dinner-time which is an hour as well. After dinner we write our spellings into our books then we do sewing till afternoon play. After play some of us have recorder lessons. Then it is soon home-time. When I get home I put my roller skates and play until tea-time at 5.00. After tea I watch T.V.I get ready for bed at 7.30 and watch more T.V. until I go to bed at 9.00.
